# ::id bolt12_07_4800.2 ::date 2012-12-19T14:01:36 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt After its competitor invented the front loading washing machine, the CEO of the American IM company believed that each of its employees had the ability for innovation , and formulated strategic countermeasures for innovation in the industry.
# ::save-date Wed Oct 30, 2013 ::file bolt12_07_4800_2.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (b / believe-01
            :ARG0 (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (c2 / company :wiki -
                              :name (n / name :op1 "IM")
                              :mod (c3 / country :wiki "United_States"
                                    :name (n2 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States")))
                        :ARG2 (c7 / CEO)))
            :ARG1 (c8 / capable-41
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :ARG1-of (e / employ-01
                              :ARG0 c2)
                        :mod (e2 / each))
                  :ARG2 (i / innovate-01
                        :ARG0 p)))
      :op2 (f / formulate-01
            :ARG0 (c / ceo)
            :ARG1 (c4 / countermeasure
                  :mod (s / strategy)
                  :purpose (i2 / innovate-01
                        :prep-in (i3 / industry))))
      :time (a3 / after
            :op1 (i4 / invent-01
                  :ARG0 (c5 / company
                        :ARG0-of (c6 / compete-01
                              :ARG1 c2))
                  :ARG1 (m / machine
                        :ARG0-of (w / wash-01)
                        :ARG1-of (l / load-01
                              :mod (f2 / front))))))

# ::id bolt12_07_4800.3 ::date 2012-12-20T08:37:49 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                                          :name (n / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States")))))))
      :li (x / 1))

# ::id bolt12_07_4800.4 ::date 2012-12-20T08:39:47 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt 2. Choose 100 innovative concepts to encourage employees to conduct research and development during their work time or spare time.
# ::save-date Wed Dec 3, 2014 ::file bolt12_07_4800_4.txt
(c / choose-01
      :ARG1 (c2 / concept :quant 100
            :ARG1-of (i / innovate-01))
      :li (x / 2)
      :purpose (e / encourage-01
            :ARG0 c2
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :ARG1-of (e2 / employ-01))
            :ARG2 (a / and
                  :op1 (r / research-01
                        :ARG0 p)
                  :op2 (d / develop-02
                        :ARG0 p)
                  :time (o / or
                        :op1 (w / work-01
                              :ARG0 p)
                        :op2 (t2 / time
                              :poss p
                              :mod (s / spare))))))

# ::id bolt12_10465_5552.1 ::date 2012-12-03T16:21:13 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Since the Tangshan Earthquake, the starting point for construction standards in the mainland is that under an earthquake of the same magnitude, buildings should preserve their basic frame without collapsing.
# ::save-date Tue Jan 7, 2014 ::file bolt12_10465_5552_1.txt
(p2 / point
      :mod (s / start-01
            :ARG1 (s2 / standard
                  :mod (c3 / construct-01)))
      :location (m / mainland)
      :domain (r / recommend-01
            :ARG1 (p / preserve-01
                  :ARG0 (b / building)
                  :ARG1 (f / frame
                        :part-of (t / thing)
                        :mod (b2 / basic)
                        :poss b)
                  :manner (c2 / collapse-01 :polarity -
                        :ARG0 t))
            :time (s3 / since
                  :op1 (e / earthquake :wiki "1976_Tangshan_earthquake"
                        :name (n / name :op1 "Tangshan")))
            :condition (e2 / earthquake
                  :mod (m2 / magnitude
                        :ARG1-of (s4 / same-41
                              :ARG2 (m3 / magnitude
                                    :poss e))))))

                        :ARG1-of (r / require-01)
                        :mod (t3 / this)))

# ::id bolt12_10465_5592.1 ::date 2012-12-06T20:28:51 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt I think that if our Earthquake Administration had been able beforehand to do a simulation of big earthquakes on this Longmenshan mountain earthquake belt, then on that day of May 12, once the Earthquake Administration had measured the quake at a magnitude of 7.8, we would have been able to broadly judge the extent of damage and destruction in the earthquake disaster zone.

                              :op2 (d2 / destroy-01))
                        :location (z / zone
                              :mod (d3 / disaster
                                    :mod (e2 / earthquake))))
                  :manner (b / broad))
            :condition (p2 / possible
                  :domain (s / simulate-01
                        :ARG0 (g / government-organization :wiki "China_Earthquake_Administration"

                              :mod (b3 / big)
                              :location (b4 / belt
                                    :mod (e4 / earthquake)
                                    :mod (m / mountain :wiki "Longmen_Mountains"

                        :time (b2 / beforehand)))
            :time (m2 / measure-01
                  :ARG0 g
                  :ARG1 (q / quake)
                  :ARG3 (s2 / seismic-quantity :quant 7.8))
            :time (d5 / day
                  :mod (t3 / that)

# ::id bolt12_10511_2891.6 ::date 2012-12-22T13:26:30 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91

# ::id bolt12_3991_0111.2 ::date 2012-12-16T09:21:57 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                                                                        :ARG2 (o2 / official))))
                                                      :mod (g4 / good
                                                            :degree (m2 / more)))

                  :unit (y / year)))

  :time (a2 / already))

# ::snt This writer has lived for a long time at the grass-roots level and often heard and witnessed some grass-roots officials almost sitting at meal gatherings or attending banquets every day, and never getting tired of it.
# ::save-date Tue Dec 3, 2013 ::file bolt12_3991_0321_5.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (l / live-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (w / write-01)
                  :mod (t / this))
            :duration (l4 / long)
            :location (l3 / level
                  :mod (g / grass-roots)))
      :op2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (h / hear-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (a4 / and
                        :op1 (o2 / or
                              :op1 (s / sit-01
                                    :ARG1 (p2 / person
                                          :quant (s2 / some)
                                          :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                                :ARG2 (o3 / official
                                                      :mod g)))
                                    :ARG2 (g2 / gather-01
                                          :mod (m / meal)))
                              :op2 (a3 / attend-01
                                    :ARG0 p2
                                    :ARG1 (b / banquet-01))
                              :mod (a5 / almost)
                              :frequency (r / rate-entity-91
                                    :ARG2 (t3 / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                                          :unit (d / day))))
                        :op2 (t4 / tire-01 :polarity -
                              :ARG0 o2
                              :ARG1 p2
                              :time (e2 / ever))))
            :op2 (w2 / witness-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 a4)
            :frequency (o / often)))

                  :ARG0-of (o3 / obligate-01
                             :ARG1 (r2 / run-02
                                     :ARG1 (b / between
                                             :op1 (p / party

      :snt1 (t / turn-02
            :ARG0 (p / person :wiki "Richard_Nixon"
                  :name (n / name :op1 "Nixon"))
            :ARG1 (r / relationship
                  :mod (b2 / between
                        :op1 (c / country :wiki "China"
                              :name (n2 / name :op1 "China"))
                        :op2 (c2 / country :wiki "United_States"
                              :name (n3 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))))
            :direction (a2 / around)
            :time (v / visit-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 c
                  :time (t2 / then
                        :mod (b / back))))
      :snt2 (c3 / cause-01
            :ARG1 (w / want-01 :mode interrogative :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (p2 / person :wiki "Ma_Ying-jeou"
                        :name (n4 / name :op1 "Ma" :op2 "Ying-jeou"))
                  :ARG1 (g / go-01
                        :ARG1 (n5 / name
                              :poss p2)
                        :ARG4 (h / history)
                        :direction (d / down)))))

# ::id bolt12_6325_7340.3 ::date 2012-12-08T15:59:03 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Early in the morning on September 1, my father, as usual, was riding his bicycle to Gucheng Park for exercise. At Jiuli Street, he saw someone lying on the side of the road, and so, out of kindness, he went up to check up on him and ask him to go home soon. Then, three people ran up to him, kicking and beaing him (according to the police, they had drunk four cases of beer at the time). As a result, my father's skull suffered serious injury. He bled profusely and lost consciousness. By the time he was taken to the hospital, his pupils were already dilated. However, with prompt rescue given by a doctor, he survived. As there was serious bleeding, the doctor performed a life-saving surgery to cut off a piece of skull from my father's head to remove blood clots. Due to profuse bleeding, some of the blood had already flowed into the brainstem and bottom of the brain, putting his life in danger.
# ::save-date Wed Apr 30, 2014 ::file bolt12_6325_7340_3.txt
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / ride-01
            :ARG0 (p4 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h10 / have-rel-role-91
                        :ARG1 (i / i)
                        :ARG2 (f / father)))
            :ARG1 (b / bicycle
                  :poss p4)
            :destination (p2 / park :wiki -
                  :name (n / name :op1 "Gucheng" :op2 "Park"))
            :purpose (e / exercise-02
                  :ARG0 p4)
            :time (e2 / early
                  :op1 (d / date-entity :month 9 :day 1
                        :dayperiod (m2 / morning)))
            :mod (a8 / as-usual))
      :snt2 (c / cause-01
            :ARG0 (s / see-01
                  :ARG0 (h4 / he)
                  :ARG1 (l / lie-01
                        :ARG1 (s2 / someone)
                        :ARG2 (s3 / side
                              :part-of (r2 / road)))
                  :location (r3 / road :wiki -
                        :name (n2 / name :op1 "Jiuli" :op2 "Street")))
            :ARG1 (g / go-02
                  :ARG0 h4
                  :direction (u2 / up)
                  :purpose (a / and
                        :op1 (c2 / check-06
                              :ARG0 h4
                              :ARG1 s2)
                        :op2 (a2 / ask-02
                              :ARG0 h4
                              :ARG1 (g2 / go-02
                                    :ARG0 s2
                                    :ARG4 (h / home)
                                    :time (s4 / soon))))
                  :ARG1-of (c13 / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (k / kind-41
                              :ARG1 h4))))
      :snt3 (a3 / and
            :op1 (r4 / run-02
                  :ARG0 (p3 / person :quant 3)
                  :direction (h5 / he))
            :op2 (k2 / kick-01
                  :ARG0 p3
                  :ARG1 h5)
            :op3 (b2 / beat-01
                  :ARG0 p3
                  :ARG1 h5)
            :time (t / then))
      :snt4 (s5 / say-01
            :ARG0 (p / police)
            :ARG1 (d2 / drink-01
                  :ARG0 (t3 / they)
                  :ARG1 (b3 / beer
                        :quant (v / volume-quantity :quant 4
                              :unit (c3 / case)))
                  :time (t4 / time)))
      :snt5 (r7 / result-01
            :ARG2 (s6 / suffer-01
                  :ARG0 (s7 / skull
                        :part-of (p5 / person
                              :ARG0-of (h11 / have-rel-role-91
                                    :ARG1 (i3 / i)
                                    :ARG2 (f3 / father))))
                  :ARG1 (i2 / injure-01
                        :ARG1 s7
                        :degree (s8 / serious))))
      :snt6 (a4 / and
            :op1 (b4 / bleed-01
                  :ARG1 (h6 / he)
                  :manner (p6 / profuse))
            :op2 (l2 / lose-02
                  :ARG0 h6
                  :ARG1 (c5 / consciousness)))
      :snt7 (d3 / dilate-01
            :ARG1 (p7 / pupil
                  :part-of (h7 / he))
            :time (a5 / already)
            :time (t2 / take-01
                  :ARG1 h7
                  :destination (h2 / hospital)))
      :snt8 (c6 / contrast-01
            :ARG2 (s9 / survive-01
                  :ARG0 (h8 / he)
                  :ARG1-of (c7 / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (r5 / rescue-01
                              :ARG0 (d4 / doctor)
                              :ARG1 h8
                              :manner (p8 / prompt)))))
      :snt9 (c8 / cause-01
            :ARG0 (b5 / bleed-01
                  :mod (s10 / serious))
            :ARG1 (p9 / perform-01
                  :ARG0 (d6 / doctor)
                  :ARG1 (s11 / surgery
                        :ARG0-of (s12 / save-02
                              :ARG1 (l3 / life)))
                  :purpose (c9 / cut-04

                                    :op1 c2
                                    :op2 c))
                        :ARG2 (a3 / ally-01 :polarity -
                              :ARG1 c2
                              :ARG2 c)))
            :op3 (b3 / believe-01
                  :ARG0 (p8 / person
                        :ARG1-of (i3 / include-91

                  :ARG1 (h / have-rel-role-91

# ::id bolt12_64545_0510.1 ::date 2012-12-23T18:00:08 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

            :compared-to (a2 / and
                  :op1 b4
                  :op2 b5)))
